report

Class ReportController

  • java.lang.Object
    • report.ReportController

  • public class ReportController
extends java.lang.Object
    This class includes functionality of four entities: ComplaintReport, IncomeReport, OrderReport and SurveyReport

                                            long storeID,
                                            long firstMonthHandled,
                                            long firstMonthPending,
                                            long secondMonthHandled,
                                            long secondMonthPending,
                                            long thirdMonthHandled,
                                            long thirdMonthPending,
                                            Client client)
        Create new complaints' report and adds to data base
        Parameters:
        quarterly - - specific quarterly
        year - - specific year
        storeID - - specific store's ID
        firstMonthHandled - - amount of handled complaints in first month
        firstMonthPending - - amount of pending complaints in first month
        secondMonthHandled - - amount of handled complaints in second month
        secondMonthPending - - amount of pending complaints in second month
        thirdMonthHandled - - amount of handled complaints in third month
        thirdMonthPending - - amount of pending complaints in third month
        client - - currently running client
